articles.description: Thailand reported on Thursday 75 new deaths from the coronavirus, a new daily record, bringing the total number of fatalities in the Southeast Asian country to 2,462 since the pandemic started last year.

articles.description: SINGAPORE: This year's Southeast Asian Games due to take place in Vietnam has been postponed to 2022.
